聤字的基本解释

聤
tíng
〔聤耳〕中医指耳窍化脓性疾病。

聤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tíng］
［《廣韻》特丁切，平青，定。］
耳道流脓。

聤字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耳字部】　聤； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页968第27
【廣韻】特丁切【集韻】唐丁切，?音庭。【廣韻】耳出惡水。【集韻】耳病。【本草】小兒聤耳，燕脂浸汁滴耳中，或夜明沙麝香爲細末，拭淨耳孔，用末傅之，效。

聤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
聤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Hug
tíng
〔聤 Ear〕 TCM refers to purulent disease of the ear orifice.
Hug
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tíng］
["Guangyun" special Dingqie, Pingqing, Ding. ]
Pus in the ear canal.
Hug
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Ear word department] 　聤; Kangxi strokes: 15; page number: page 968 27
[Guang Yun] Te Ding Che [Ji Yun] Tang Ding Che,? Yin Ting. 【Guangyun】Earth comes out. [Jiyun] Ear disease. [Materia Medica] For children's ears, drip the yanzhi juice into the ears, or the luminous musk as the fine powder, wipe the ear holes, and use the powder to make it effective.
